content:
The issue seems to be that you've configured a single outgoing (SMTP) server to be used by the 3 accounts when what you really need is different SMTP server settings for each.

What you appear to be missing is that you may create as many outgoing server settings as you wish, independently of your other mail account settings, by choosing Outgoing Server (SMTP) at the bottom of the list of mail accounts in the account settings, then adding as many server settings there as needed, naming them however you wish to better distinguish them. You can then associate each of those SMTP servers with a different account / identity.
